page.title: 01THE AREA OF OUR STUDY
page.content: The area we have been given to study extends from Newport in the West to North Ormesby in the East, and from Linthorpe in the South to Port Clarence in the North. The river Tees runs through our area from East to West and causes the land to be divided into two main parts. The Northern half of the area on either side of the river is used by industries, many of which need to be by the river, and the Southern half of the map has many houses, together with shops and parks that the people living there need.
